items.title: Version - 6.1.2
items.content: Next version will include huge WooCommerce improvements (almost fully blockified and custom block styles) and a reworked admin interface that allows to define recommended theme extensions/plugins.

items.title: Special thanks to:
items.content: Translation contributors: Dan Caragea, Vlad T, Peter Smits, Olivier Van Eester, Pieterjan Deneys.
